parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance to which the topic belongs.

parameters.name: Perm
parameters.description:
The read/write mode that you want to configure for the topic. Valid values:

*   **6**: Both read and write operations are allowed.
*   **4**: Write operations are forbidden.
*   **2**: Read operations are forbidden.

parameters.name: Topic
parameters.description: The name of the topic that you want to manage.
